system.effect: Replaces RoF with S/-/-, increases damage to 1d10+7 E, and penetration to 5, weapon gains Accurate Quality. However, decreases Clip Size to 1. Up to +20 to Acquisition Tests if acquired through a friendly Tau Settlement.
